name: PSYCHEDESCENT
description:
...

Steer with your mouse pointer. See how long you can survive.

Play at least until the music drops. 

Music credit: EastNewSound, 緋色月下、狂咲ノ絶　-1st Anniversary Remix-

Made in autumn 2021. 

The entire tunnel is procedurally generated at runtime. There are various shader effects that react to the music's beat.
